summary: Proposal to wrap Core globals within a CoreRuntime singleton pattern in the Ruby SDK to better manage core runtime lifecycle and dependencies.
userImpact: Users would benefit from cleaner core runtime management and better control over lifecycle dependencies.
proposedFix: Implement a CoreRuntime singleton to wrap Core globals instead of using raw global variables.
resolutionDetails: The CoreRuntime singleton pattern was implemented to properly manage core runtime globals in the Ruby SDK.
keyQuote: Wrap Core globals within a `CoreRuntime` singleton in Ruby
